source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.cost_center_dim)
- **New Data:** where a Cost_Ctr in the source does not exist as a CostCenterCode in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Cost_Ctr in source and CostCenterCode in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an CostCenterCode in the target exists but the same Cost_Ctr doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View costcenter_dim_new is created

%%sql 
-- # -- Build OrganisationUnit_dim table

-- # INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.OrganisationUnit_dim (
-- #     OrganisationUnitID,
-- #     OrganisationUnit,
-- #     Description,
-- #     OrganisationUnitKey,
-- #     SourceSystemID,
-- #     StartDate,
-- #     EndDate,
-- #     IngestionDate,
-- #     ValidTo
-- # )

SELECT
    uuid() AS OrganisationUnitID,
    T1.Org_unit as OrganisationUnit,
    T1.Organizational_Unit AS Description,
    T1.Organizational_Key12 AS OrganisationUnitKey,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo
FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
GROUP BY T1.Org_unit, T1.Organizational_Unit, T1.Organizational_Key12

%%sql
-- Build costcenter_dim_new table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW costcenter_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Cost_Ctr IS NULL
        THEN first(T7.CostCenterID)
        ELSE NULL
    END as CostCenterID, -- surrogate key
    T1.Cost_Ctr AS CostCenterCode,
    T1.Cost_Centre AS Description,
    first(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.Cost_Ctr,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Cost_Centre,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Cost_Ctr = first(T7.CostCenterCode) AND  md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.Cost_Ctr,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Cost_Centre,'.'))) <> first(T7.RowID)    -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN first(T7.CostCenterCode) IS NULL -- new employee
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Cost_Ctr IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.CostCenter_Dim T7 ON T1.Cost_Ctr = T7.CostCenterCode
WHERE  (T7.IsActive = 'Y' or T7.IsActive IS NULL)
    
        AND (
        
        -- flags new data        
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.Cost_Ctr = T7.CostCenterCode AND  md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.Cost_Ctr,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Cost_Centre,'.'))) <> T7.RowID    -- same employee, changed data
                THEN 'Y'
                WHEN T7.CostCenterCode IS NULL -- new employee
                THEN 'Y'
                ELSE 'N'
            END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.Cost_Ctr IS NULL
                THEN 'Y'
                ELSE 'N'
            END = 'Y' )
)
GROUP BY T1.Cost_Ctr, T1.Cost_Centre
;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **CostCenter_Dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View CostCenter_Dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW CostCenter_Dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    CostCenterID, -- surrogate key
    CostCenterCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
From CostCenter_Dim_new

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    CostCenterID, -- surrogate key
    CostCenterCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.CostCenter_Dim
WHERE CostCenterCode IN (SELECT CostCenterCode FROM CostCenter_Dim_new);

# View CostCenter_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. CostCenterID from employee_dim), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.CostCenter_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.CostCenter_Dim AS Target
USING CostCenter_Dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.CostCenterID = Target.CostCenterID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.EndDate = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.CostCenter_dim_changed_rows is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new employee_hr_hierarchy_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.CostCenter_Dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CostCenterID NULLS LAST) AS CostCenterID,
    CostCenterCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.CostCenter_Dim;

Select * FROM odw_harmonised_db.CostCenter_Dim;
